LeadLineItem.name: LeadLineItem
LeadLineItem.description: Represents items such as vehicles, accessories, and parts that a lead is interested in.

AssetIdentificationNumber.description: The unique identifier of the associated product, such as a vehicle identification number or serial number of an accessory.

Classification.description: Specifies the classification type of the associated item such as new, used, or refurbished.

Condition.description: Specifies the condition of the associated item, such as excellent, fair, or unknown.

InterestType.description: Specifies the lead's interest type such as buying an item, selling an item, leasing an item, and so on.

ItemType.description: Specifies the type of item that the lead is interested in, such as a vehicle, parts of a vehicle, other accessories, and so on.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LeadId.description: The parent Lead record that's associated with this line item.

Name.description: The name of the lead line item.

PriceType.description: Specifies the type of price, such as quote, offer, or appraisal, associated with the item.

ProductId.description: The Product record associated with this line item.

Quantity.description: The number of units of the item that the lead is interested in.

UnitPrice.description: The price per unit of the associated product.
